text:
Hello, everyone. :slightly_smiling_face:
I need your help.
If you search for a specific keyword with a search module in a webpage made with a HubSpot, you want to unify the design of the webpage before the search, but that doesn't work. (The pre-search web page design is a page made up of modules using templates that you created yourself.)
I looked it up in the HubSpot community and I think I need to modify the search result page in the design tool, so if anyone has experienced the same problem as me, could you tell me the solution?
